about_the_game:
The Second Circle is a skill-based fast paced movement game. The only thing holding you back is how quickly you can master your powers. You can unlock new weapons and abilities for more stylish and quicker combos, however, in the end no matter what weapons or abilities your use, it is your skill that will prove whether you are worthy to pass the trial or be forever stuck in the circle of desire!

Unique Mix of Sword Play and Archery

All your abilities and weapons are designed to synergize, from jumping on top of enemies in a wild fury of sword slashes, knocking them back then rushing in to execute them, or juggling them in the air without giving them a chance to attack back! All abilities can be chained together to create any number of unique fighting styles.

Fluid and Fast Paced Movement Mechanics

From Wall running to throwing grappling hooks and quickly sliding or even using your enemies as means to reach your destination! Master your movement tech with fluid parkour which blends together with abilities and rush through the arenas unleashing havoc on all enemies that stand in your way! 

Style Rankings

Mix together weapons and combos from throwing your enemies into the void with your chain hook or executing them with dark magic, juggle your weapons to finish them off as quickly and stylishly as possible to get the highest ranking!

  • Processor: Intel i5 2300 @ 2.8GHz / AMD FX 6100 @ 3.3 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 / AMD R9 290X
